name: THE ABDUCTEE
description:
TO: Director, FBI

FROM: [REDACTED]

Subject: The Abductee

The following information has been retrieved through preliminary investigations and interviews with residents of [REDACTED].

On the night of [REDACTED], a number of strange phenomena were observed, including “dancing lights” in the sky, electronic interference and sightings of tall, humanoid figures. Later on, at around [REDACTED], multiple witnesses claimed to hear a distant crash of a “unearthly” nature, as well as multiple gunshots. 

Finally, a local resident, Mr [REDACTED] has been reported as missing. He was last heard phoning from the nearby town of [REDACTED], and was due to drive back tonight. He is known as a firearms user, it is possible that the gunshots heard were his. We are currently looking into his whereabouts. 

In my personal opinion, Director, I think this is the start of another hunt. I don’t think we’ll find him. 

[REDACTED]

PRESS Q TO CHANGE WEAPONS!

Icon Background Credit : Naran Bayar  at https://unsplash.com/@naranbayar_1
